title: About This Application
description: This application is a modern web platform built with React and Vite, designed to showcase the latest features and best practices in web development. It serves as a practical example of how to build a scalable and maintainable frontend application.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide a comprehensive and interactive learning experience for developers. We aim to deliver a clear and concise demonstration of React concepts, state management, routing, and more.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: This project is brought to you by a team of passionate developers dedicated to creating high-quality software and sharing knowledge with the community.
